cards.testimonial: Focus on behavioral preparation was key.

cards.testimonial: System design and microservices knowledge was crucial.

cards.name: Sanya Kapoor
cards.testimonial: Strong problem-solving skills and OOP concepts helped.

cards.testimonial: Focus on scalability and real-world applications paid off.
